title: Shadow Document Tracking Spreadsheet Screenshot
description: Screenshot of the unofficial Excel spreadsheet used by processors to track stale document expiration dates. This shadow process was identified during interviews (EV-019) as a workaround for Encompass's disabled stale-doc alert rule (WF-008 in EV-021).
redaction_notes: Borrower names replaced with loan IDs; SSNs removed from view
annotations: Spreadsheet maintained by P.Davis on local drive (not shared network)
Tracks 47 active loans with document expiration dates
Color coding: Red = expired, Yellow = expiring within 7 days, Green = current
Formula errors visible in rows 23 and 31 (incorrect date calculations)
Last modified timestamp shows daily updates - confirms active shadow process
finding: CONTROL_GAP - Critical document tracking occurs outside auditable systems; no version control or backup
